title: Contemporary Indonesia Retreat in Jayapura with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Discover the best of Papua's vibrant capital with an escape to this modern retreat, conveniently located in the heart of Jayapura. From the contemporary rooms and well-equipped fitness centre to the all-day restaurant, Lime Resto and Terrace, you'll have everything you need for a stress-free stay.

Steps away from bustling markets, waterfront views and cultural landmarks, Mercure Jayapura puts you right on the pulse of adventure. Nearby Lake Sentani offers incredible landscapes and traditional experiences, while Hamadi Beach is within easy access.
offer_address: Jl. Ahmad Yani No.12, Gurabesi, Jayapura Utara, Jayapura, Papua, 99111, Indonesia
